Correlation of Tissue Price Index vs. RISI NBSK, High Grades Price Index Mixed Papers Index, and BEK RISI Index

To compare tissue prices with tissueâ€™s major materials cost drivers we ran correlations between tissue and NBSK prices, between tissue and high grade recycled fibers prices, between tissue and mixed grade wastepaper prices, and between tissue and BEK. We also looked at the period-over-period changes in each time series, to see how often a change in one price was correlated to a change in another price. The following are the results:

I.  After running the correlation between the Tissue Price Indexa and NBSK RISI Priceb for the period Jan 1991-March 2001 we found a correlation coefficient of 54%. When we looked at the correlation of changes of period-over-period of these two variables, it gave us a coefficient correlation of 16%.
 (See table at the end of document)
See graph below for a visual picture of this relationship

      Graph of PPI Tissue Index and RISI NBSK
